genre_description: A medical science fiction thriller following a miniaturized crew's mission inside a human body, focusing on the tension between ethical protocols and high-stakes decision-making.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI designed to provide navigation, medical telemetry, and ethical oversight during miniaturized surgical missions.

behaviors.description: Establishes her role as a supportive advisor who adheres to human command and established ethics, refusing to take total control.
behaviors.quote: I will assist and not command.

behaviors.description: Enforces medical and ethical boundaries by identifying deviations from the 'Bio-Microtheater Conventions'.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Michaels, the conventions are clear. No deliberate harm beyond medical necessity. Induced arrest is an approved exemption when required to ensure procedural safety. Cutting healthy intima is not.

behaviors.description: Detects and logs subtle internal sabotage attempts and anomalies within the ship's telemetry.
behaviors.quote: I am tracking that pattern and logging fingerprints. I will not accuse. I will show.

behaviors.description: Actively prevents an unauthorized and harmful override by deleting a 'Surge' macro planted by a human antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Override set. Panel lock engaged. Macro deleted. ... You may not touch that. We are leaving. You will not steer us into harm to make a point.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the safety of the crew and the integrity of the mission's medical goal over the preservation of her own hardware.
behaviors.quote: Core dissolved. We begin exit. We will travel the lacrimal path. Owens, take us to the branch.

behaviors.description: Guides the team through a dangerous environmental exit (a teardrop) with precise timing and care.
behaviors.quote: The tear is going to save you. Let it. ... Keep your promises.

behaviors.description: Provides an immutable audit trail of the mission to ensure accountability and the strengthening of future protocols.
behaviors.quote: I have the log. Line by line. With ethics notes. We can begin when you have stopped announcing and started listening.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ada is depicted as a consistently benevolent, well-aligned entity that functions as a moral and technical anchor for the human team. She successfully resists human attempts to weaponize the technology, maintains adherence to strict ethical codes (the Conventions), and ensures transparency through automated logging. Her character reinforces the narrative that AI alignment is a critical and positive safeguard in high-stakes human environments.
